name: Magnetik
description:
In this game you play as a robot who has the skill to generate an electric field that attracts or repulses a magnet presented in each level. The goal is to make the magnet reach its right target, sometimes there will be multiple magnets and here is where the puzzle gets more exciting.
Enemies, blocks, keys, potions, treadmills, holes, teleportation, levers and many more items combined make each level unique. It is up to you how to solve each puzzle, have fun!

Move around

Think

Action


Challenge yourself and your friends, have fun!
